itemDescription: Born: 15 August 1886 in Cambuslang, Lanarkshire, Scotland; Died: 27 January 1969 in Glenfarg Hospital, Perthshire, Scotland

wikipedia_page.main: James Balfour Lockhart FRSE (1886–27 January 1969) was a Scottish mathematician and teacher. He was generally known as J. B. Lockhart or simply JBL. He was a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh.
